item.description: In August, it was just me & Molly and Liz & Rosebud who attended the meetup. We hope more of you can make it in September. Salem Willows is such a nice park so we haven't changed the location, but if you have another suggestion, please let me know and I can plan to have October's meetup there!

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel September Meetup
